Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts7.2/SawEvent helpCo: continue/8 10/EdwinPayne 7 8 2 MontyFinch 7 14 0 farmer 9 9 3/showFrame EdwinPayne 18/skippable/pause 1000/move MontyFinch 0 -3 0/speak EdwinPayne "Monty? What are you and @ doing here?"/stopAnimation EdwinPayne/showFrame EdwinPayne 19/speak MontyFinch "I know this is a big favor to ask, but... I need your help."/speak EdwinPayne "You have a case for us?#$b#Let me get Charles--"/speak MontyFinch "No, not a case, exactly.#$b#Do you remember, um, what the Cat King said?"/speak EdwinPayne "Are you referring to when he revealed your allegiance with the witch who was trying to end Charles' and my existence? Of course.$a"/emote farmer 16/speak MontyFinch "I'm really sorry about all of that...$s#$b#I wanted to apologize to you but I couldn't put it into words when I tried to write it down, and you didn't seem interested in talking again...$s#$b#She's my witch, and I'm her familiar, and I literally can't disobey her.$s#$b#At first it was just a job, getting close to you to trick you, but then I realized I actually liked you.$s#$b#I tried to convince Esther to let her grudge go, but it was too late.$s"/emote EdwinPayne 28/speak EdwinPayne "Yes, I... I confess I may have been avoiding you.$s#$b#I do appreciate the apology, and I regret the situation you were put in by Esther Finch.$s"/emote MontyFinch 20/speak MontyFinch "Thanks, Edwin.#$b#So will you help me and @?"/speak EdwinPayne "That depends entirely on what you need help with. It is not a case, as you said, so I deduce it must be related to your troubles with Esther.$u#$b#I shouldn't like to cross her again, so I do hope you don't intend me to join in any violent or retributive actions."/speak MontyFinch "No, I wouldn't put you in danger from her... Not again, I mean.$s#$b#She transformed me so that I turn back into a crow every night as soon as the sun sets.#$b#There's a ritual we can perform, and since you're the best at magic, I figured it would be safer with you there to perform it."/emote EdwinPayne 40/speak EdwinPayne "I see. And I assume this ritual is quite dangerous?#$b#@, what is your opinion in all this?"/quickQuestion #We really need your help. Monty's right, it would be safer with you there.#You don't owe Monty anything, especially after he betrayed you. I didn't know the full story until now.#Actually, I think this whole thing is a bad idea. I changed my mind.(break)friendship MontyFinch 100\friendship EdwinPayne 30\speak EdwinPayne "Very well then. I shall do some research to prepare."\speak MontyFinch "Thank you so much! Meet me and @ at Esther's house when you're ready.$l"\emote MontyFinch 20\action AddMail Current {{ModId}}_ConvincedEdwinFlag received\end(break)friendship MontyFinch -500\friendship EdwinPayne 10\faceDirection MonyFinch 1\emote MontyFinch 12\speak EdwinPayne "I see... I apologize, Monty, but I must agree with @.$s#$b#I do sympathize with your plight, but I cannot put myself nor Charles at risk of reprisal from Esther.$s#$b#Best of luck with your attempts."\showFrame EdwinPayne 18\end(break)friendship MontyFinch -1000\faceDirection MonyFinch 1\emote MontyFinch 12\speak MontyFinch "@! You promised you'd help!$a#$b#speak EdwinPayne "I see... I apologize, Monty, but I must agree with @.$s#$b#This is a dangerous proposal, and we cannot get involved.$s"\faceDirection MontyFinch 2\speak MontyFinch "Fine. Some friends you guys are.$a#$b#I'll do it myself.$a"\move MontyFinch 0 -4\pause 500\end/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_JojaRouteWarning/GameStateQuer: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 CharlesRowland 64 18 0/broadcastEvent/pause 1000/friendship EdwinPayne -500/friendship CharlesRowland -250/speak CharlesRowland "Hey, @.#$b#So I guess you've heard by now, but they started work on the old community center last night. Turned it into a warehouse, apparently."/pause 1000/speak CharlesRowland "It'll make things difficult for us, but there's nowhere else to move the agency to, so we've just got to carry on, yeah?#$b#Edwin's pretty angry, though... thought I should warn you.#$b#He'll get over it eventually... I hope.#$b#Just thought I should let you know."/faceDirection CharlesRowland 2/pause 1000/faceDirection CharlesRowland 0/speak CharlesRowland "Oh, and... we also heard there were plans to maybe turn it into a movie theatre. You heard anything about that?"/question null "#No#Yes"/speak CharlesRowland "Right... well, if that happened, we'd probably have to leave.#$b#You might not see us around town as much, 'cause it's not like Crystal would want us staying with her again.#$b#Just something to think about, yeah?"/pause 800/speak CharlesRowland "Anyway, see you around."/move CharlesRowland 0 2 2/pause 500/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts7.1/Friendship Mont: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 MontyFinch 64 19 0/skippable/pause 2000/speak MontyFinch "Hi, @. Sorry, I know it's kind of early...#$b#I have a favor to ask you."/emote farmer 8/speak MontyFinch "I tried to keep it a secret, but Esther made sure that didn't work.#$b#It's true... I'm actually a crow. She made me into a boy so that I could help her with her insane plans, but I'm sick of being used.#$b#I don't want to be under her thumb anymore. I want to be able to live my own life, but as a human, not as a crow."/move MontyFinch 0 -1 0/speak MontyFinch "There's a spell that could make me human, permanently. But it needs three people.#$b#Will you help me?"/quickQuestion Will you help me?#Of course I'll help.#No, find someone else.#Who else are you getting to help?(break)switchEvent helpMontyEasy(break)switchEvent noHelpMonty(break)switchEvent whoHelpMonty/pause 100/speak MontyFinch "ERROR THIS SHOULDN'T BE SEEN"/end
Entries.helpMontyEasy: pause 1/speak MontyFinch "Thank you so much. You have no idea how much this means to me."/friendship MontyFinch 100/quickQuestion #Who else are you getting to help us?#How do I help you?(break)switchEvent whoHelpMonty(break)switchEvent ritualDetails/pause 100/speak MontyFinch "ERROR THIS SHOULDN'T BE SEEN"/end
Entries.ritualDetails: pause 1/speak MontyFinch "I'll take care of everything. I'll send you a letter when I'm done getting the spell ready, so just wait for that.#$b#Thank you so much, again."/emote MontyFinch heart/emote farmer heart/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.noHelpMonty: pause 1/speak MontyFinch "Oh... okay. Forget I asked.$s#$b#Sorry to bother you. I'll go now.$s"/friendship MontyFinch -1000/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.whoHelpMonty: pause 1/speak MontyFinch "I don't know if he'll agree, but... Edwin is the best spellcaster I know.#$b#If anything goes wrong, he should be there."/quickQuestion #I don't want to help you.#Okay. How do I help?#Why wouldn't he help?(break) switchEvent noHelpMonty(break)switchEvent ritualDetails(break)switchEvent MontyEdwinBackstory/pause 100/speak MontyFinch "ERROR THIS SHOULDN'T BE SEEN"/end
Entries.MontyEdwinBackstory: pause 1/speak MontyFinch "It's kind of a long story, but... remember how I mentioned that Esther used me?#$b#She made me trick Edwin, manipulate him, so that she could take revenge on him and Charles after they crossed her.#$b#He was the angriest I've ever seen him.$s"/emote farmer sad/speak MontyFinch "If he won't help, well... I don't know what I'll do."/quickQuestion #Actually, this is a bad idea. I don't want to help you.#I'll help you convince Edwin.#If Edwin won't help, I still will. What should I do?(break)switchEvent noHelpMonty(break)switchEvent helpConvinceEdwin(break)switchEvent ritualDetails/pause 100/speak MontyFinch "ERROR THIS SHOULDN'T BE SEEN"/end
Entries.helpConvinceEdwin: pause 1/speak MontyFinch "Really? That's so nice of you.$h#$b#Meet me at the Community Center later."/friendship MontyFinch 30/emote farmer heart/speak MontyFinch "I'll go start getting things ready. See you!"/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts4/f MontyFinch 1000: continue/x y/farmer x y z MontyFinch x y z EstherFinch 1000 1000 3/skippable/playSound floorboardCreak/shake farmer 1000/move farmer x y z/emote farmer 40/playSound crow/move farmer x y z/move MontyFinch x y z/playSound crow/showHudMessage "There's no sign of Monty... where is he?"/faceDirection farmer 1/warp Esther Finch x y/flash/jump farmer 8/speak EstherFinch "How did you get in here, you nosy little shit?#$b#Did Monty tell you that you could come over? Lovestruck little fool."/move EstherFinch -x y z/shake farmer/speak EstherFinch "Poor thing. You don't even know the secrets he keeps."/move EstherFinch -x y z/speak EstherFinch "Wondering where he is? He's right behind you."/faceDirection farmer 3/speak EstherFinch "He's a crow, honey. You didn't know? Oops."/playSound crow/faceDirection farmer 1/speak EstherFinch "My sweet crow familiar.#$b#Too bad the little fool keeps falling in love with anyone who gives him the time of day. Oh well, he'll learn his lesson soon enough."/move farmer -x y z backwards?/speak EstherFinch "Now scram, kid. You're trespassing."/move farmer x y z/hurry farmer/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts10/Friendship Monty: continue/27 12/farmer 1000 1000 1 MontyFinch 28 9 2 JennyButcher 28 12 0 EdwinPayne 999 999 1 CharlesRowland 998 998 1 NikoSasaki 997 997 0 CrystalPalace 996 996 0/skippable/speak JennyButcher "That should be everything. We're lucky Robin could build an extension onto the shop so quickly.#$b#Now, ground rules: rent is due on the 28th, and for the love of God don't pay it in loose coins.#$b#Second: the shop isn't a hangout spot. I run a business. All teenage drama goes outside or to your room.#$b#Third: don't--"/doAction 28 18/warp farmer 28 19/move farmer 0 -4 true/faceDirection JennyButcher 2/speak MontyFinch "@! I was gonna invite you over, but you beat me to it.$h#$b#Jenny let me move in. I couldn't spend another minute in that house with Esther."/speak JennyButcher "Yeah, because apparently I run a house for troubled teens now.#$b#Whatever. You don't seem like as much trouble as the fucking Scooby Gang upstairs, so don't make me regret this."/speak MontyFinch "Thanks, Jenny!"move farmer -1 0 1 true/move JennyButcher 0 7 3/warp JennyButcher 1000 1000/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/speak MontyFinch "Seriously, I wanted to thank you. Without you, I'd still be stuck.#$b#But now I've got a life and a place of my own and...#$b#...a friend.$l"/emote farmer 20/warp NikoSasaki? 28 19/move NikoSaski? 0 -4 0/speak NikoSasaki? "Monty! I can't believe we're going to be neighbors!$h"/warp CrystalPalace 28 19/move NikoSasaki? 1 0 3/move CrystalPalace 0 -3 0/speak Crystal Palace "Wow, nice digs. Did Jenny give you The Talk?$h"/emote Monty 32/ignoreCollisions CharlesRowland/ignoreCollisions EdwinPayne/warp EdwinPayne 23 12/warp CharlesRowland 23 13/move Charles Rowland 3 0 1 true/move EdwinPayne 3 0 1 true/pause 2000/beginSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection CrystalPalace 3 true/faceDirection MontyFinch 3 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/jump Crystal Palace 6/jump NikoSasaki? 6/jump farmer 6/jump MontyFinch 6/endSimultaneousCommand/speak CrystalPalace "Would it kill you two to knock? I'm gonna die of a heart attack some day and it'll be your fault.$a"/speak EdwinPayne "You live with ghosts and call yourself a detective. A detective should be prepared for such events.#$b#Anyway, we came to congratulate Monty.$h"/speak CharlesRowland "Yeah, good job, mate. We're glad to have you around.$h"/speak MontyFinch "Thank @. I wouldn't be here without ${him^her^them}$.#$b#You're all welcome to come over any time.$h"/speak CrystalPalace "Why don't we celebrate? Monty, you choose. Movie night or game night?$"/emote MontyFinch 20/pause 1000/end
